nl.weeaboo.vn.text

Interface ITextLog

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface ITextLog
extends java.io.Serializable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendText(nl.weeaboo.styledtext.StyledText text)
      Appends additional text to the current page.
      void clear()
      Clears the contents of the text log.
      nl.weeaboo.styledtext.StyledText getPage(int offset)
      Returns the contents of the indicated page, or null if the specified page doesn't exist.
      int getPageCount()
      Returns the number of currently used pages.
      int getPageLimit()
      Returns the maximum number of pages that this text log will store.
      void setPageLimit(int numPages)
      Changes the page limit.
      void setText(nl.weeaboo.styledtext.StyledText text)
      Creates a new page and fills it with the supplied text.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the contents of the text log.

      • getPageCount

        int getPageCount()
        Returns the number of currently used pages.

      • getPage

        @Nullable
nl.weeaboo.styledtext.StyledText getPage(int offset)
        Returns the contents of the indicated page, or null if the specified page doesn't exist.

      • getPageLimit

        int getPageLimit()
        Returns the maximum number of pages that this text log will store. Attempting to store more pages will discard the oldest page.

      • setPageLimit

        void setPageLimit(int numPages)
        Changes the page limit.
        See Also:
        getPageLimit()

      • setText

        void setText(nl.weeaboo.styledtext.StyledText text)
        Creates a new page and fills it with the supplied text.

        Appends additional text to the current page.
